Package org.jamwiki.taglib

A collection of JSP tags offering JAMWiki-specific functionality.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractButtonTag
    This abstract class implements functionality for both the "radio" tag and "checkbox" tag as they are very similar.
    AuthMsgTag
    Utility tag for creating HTML checkboxes.
    CheckboxTag
    Utility tag for creating HTML checkboxes.
    EditCommentTag
    This class provides capability to format an edit comment, parsing out any section name that is present and converting it into a link to the section.
    EnabledTag
    JSP tag that executes its tag content only if the specified property has a value of true.
    ImageLinkTag
    JSP tag used to build an HTML image link for a specified topic that corresponds to an image that has been uploaded to the Wiki.
    ImageUrlTag
    JSP tag used to build a URL to an image file.
    LinkParamTag
    JSP tag used within LinkTag tags to add query parameters to the generated URL, performing any required encoding of the query parameters.
    LinkTag
    JSP tag that creates an HTML link to a Wiki topic, generating the servlet context and virtual wiki in the link and also properly encoding the topic for use in the URL.
    PaginationTag
    JSP tag used to generate a pagination object.
    RadioTag
    Utility tag for creating HTML radio boxes.
    ReCaptchaTag
    Utility tag for displaying reCAPTCHA input fields.
    TextTag
    Utility tag for creating HTML text inputs.
    WatchlistTag
    JSP tag used to highlight the tag content if the specified topic is in the current users's watchlist.
    WikiVersionTag
    JSP tag that displays the current Wiki version as specified by WikiVersion.CURRENT_WIKI_VERSION.

Package org.jamwiki.taglib Description

A collection of JSP tags offering JAMWiki-specific functionality.
